thread.title: Joe Biden Draws Contrasts With Hillary Clinton, Touts His Experience
thread.title_full: Joe Biden Draws Contrasts With Hillary Clinton, Touts His Experience - WSJ

author: Colleen McCain Nelson
title: Joe Biden Draws Contrasts With Hillary Clinton, Touts His Experience
text:
WASHINGTON—Vice President Joe Biden, poised to make a decision about whether to run for president, at a Tuesday appearance sought to distinguish himself as a presidential adviser without an equal, and drew subtle distinctions with Democratic front-runner Hillary Clinton.
Mr. Biden used a forum honoring former Vice President Walter Mondale to explain his views on the nation’s No. 2 office and to detail the central role he has played in President Barack Obama’s administration. For nearly seven years, he has been the last...
